targets.query: SELECT last("startedT") AS "startedT" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)

targets.expr:
sum(
max_over_time(requests_latency_secondsHistogram_count{group="$GatlingTransaction", responseCode!="0", error!=""}[${__range_s}s]) 
- min_over_time(requests_latency_secondsHistogram_count{group="$GatlingTransaction", responseCode!="0", error!=""}[${__range_s}s])
) by (metric, error, responseCode)

sum(
max_over_time(requests_latency_secondsHistogram_count{group="$GatlingTransaction", oK="KO"}[${__range_s}s])
- min_over_time(requests_latency_secondsHistogram_count{group="$GatlingTransaction", oK="KO"}[${__range_s}s])
) by (metric)
/ sum(
max_over_time(requests_latency_secondsHistogram_count{group="$GatlingTransaction"}[${__range_s}s])
- min_over_time(requests_latency_secondsHistogram_count{group="$GatlingTransaction"}[${__range_s}s])
) by (metric)
